DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine immunophilin ligand may potential reverse hair loss .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Ligands Human Hair Follicles Grafted Onto SCID Mice
DOC.detailed_description: Preliminary experiment C57BL/6J mouse show immunophilin ligand FK506 non-immunosuppressive analog , GP11046 GP11511 capable promote telogen anagen transition . Since GP11046 GP11511 posse neurotrophic property FK506 without immunosuppressant capability , neural action immunophilin ligand may play important role hair cycle . This finding significant clinical implication immunophilin ligand may potential reverse alopecia . To investigate possibility propose explore response transplant miniaturized scalp hair follicle topically apply immunophilin ligand .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men age 1865 Hamilton type IV V alopecia Individuals meet inclusion criterion .
